function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Tight time and budgetary constraints in building design","Impact":"Limits the ability to implement effective disease mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Allocate more resources and time for comprehensive disease mitigation strategies","Technologies":"Building design software for simulating airflow and infection spread","People":"Building designers, project managers, stakeholders","Owner":"Building designers, project managers, stakeholders"},{"Description":"Power dynamics dictating building outcomes","Impact":"Could lead to prioritization of factors other than disease prevention","Mitigation":"Implement transparent decision-making processes that consider disease prevention as a priority","Technologies":"Collaborative decision-making platforms, data-driven decision support systems","People":"Stakeholders, design professionals, decision-makers","Owner":"Stakeholders, design professionals, decision-makers"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for socio-ecological system impact","Impact":"May result in unintentional negative effects on disease propagation within the environment","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive environmental impact assessments that include disease propagation factors","Technologies":"Environmental impact assessment tools, disease modeling software","People":"Design professionals, environmental experts, stakeholders","Owner":"Design professionals, environmental experts"}]}
